name: .UTZ File Extension
summary: Learn about .UTZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Theme package used by UIQ-based mobile phones, which include some phones created by Sony Ericsson and Motorola; contains a theme, including graphics and sounds; used to change the look and feel of mobile phone interfaces.

content: UTZ files are stored in a compressed Zip format. They contain an .XML configuration file named Theme.xml as well as other files, such as .PNG images and .MP3, .MID, and .M4A audio files. Theme.xml specifies the user interface layout and playback properties for the packaged theme files.
The UTZ format is used by UIQ, a program based on Symbian OS that controls the graphical user interface of mobile phone devices.
NOTE: Sony Ericsson Themes Creator has been discontinued.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
